localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.body: #bitcoin price is tracking Stock-to-Flow model like clockwork.  If BTC does follows its historical path, we will take out gold in 2021-2024, and real estate 2024-2028. After real estate we can not interpolate anymore and have to extrapolate, uncharted waters, hyperbitcoinization? https://t.co/prLSKKiB6Q
blogPost.title: #bitcoin price is tracking Stock-to-Flow model like clockwork.  If BTC does follows its historical path, we will take out gold in 2021-2024, and real estate 2024-2028. After real estate we can not interpolate anymore and have to extrapolate, uncharted waters, hyperbitcoinization? https://t.co/prLSKKiB6Q
blogPost.author: PlanB

localize.full_text: #比特币 的价格像钟表一样跟踪库存到流量的模型。如果BTC确实走上了它的历史道路，我们将在2021-2024年拿出黄金，在2024-2028年拿出房地产。房地产之后我们不能再插了，还要外推，未知的水域，超比特化？https://t.co/prLSKKiB6Q
#比特幣 的價格像鐘錶一樣跟蹤庫存到流量的模型。如果BTC確實走上了它的歷史道路，我們將在2021-2024年拿出黃金，在2024-2028年拿出房地產。房地產之後我們不能再插了，還要外推，未知的水域，超比特化？https://t.co/prLSKKiB6Q

previous.excerpt:
For those who are not familiar, gold is an amazing anti corrosion conductor and
has numerous other properties that give it productive value. Years back, I would
hear the argument that gold is more intrinsically valuable than BTC for this
very reason.

With that being said, the price of gold today…
previous.title: Bitcoin displacing Gold as a store of value will free up literal TONS of gold for industrial, technology, and science applications. We’re making the world better in so many ways!

localize.title: 比特币取代黄金作为一种储值手段，将释放成吨的黄金，用于工业、技术和科学应用。我们正以如此多的方式让世界变得更美好！
localize.the_new_excerpt:
对于那些不熟悉的人来说，黄金是一种令人惊叹的防腐导体，
有许多其他的属性赋予它生产价值。几年前，我会
听一下关于黄金在本质上比比特币更有价值的论点
非常有理由。

话虽如此，今天的黄金价格…

localize.title: 比特幣取代黃金作爲一種儲值手段，將釋放成噸的黃金，用於工業、技術和科學應用。我們正以如此多的方式讓世界變得更美好！
localize.the_new_excerpt:
對於那些不熟悉的人來說，黃金是一種令人驚歎的防腐導體，
有許多其他的屬性賦予它生產價值。幾年前，我會
聽一下關於黃金在本質上比比特幣更有價值的論點
非常有理由。

話雖如此，今天的黃金價格…
